sentences.en: A wave of happiness flooded me.
sentences.cn: 我心中涌起一股幸福的暖流。

sentences.en: Being rich doesn't actually increase your happiness quotient.
sentences.cn: 有钱不见得能提高你的幸福指数。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Happiness was an emotion that Reynolds was having to relearn.
sentences.cn: 雷诺兹已经不知道什么是快乐。

sentences.en: Happiness, which had been so elusive in Henry's life, still evaded him.
sentences.cn: 亨利生活中过去一直难以捕捉的幸福仍旧与他无缘。

sentences.en: He found happiness in later life.
I sort of made my own happiness.
sentences.cn: 可以这么说，是我自己创造了自己的幸福。

sentences.en: I think mostly she was looking for happiness.
sentences.cn: 我认为她主要是在寻找快乐。

sentences.en: Jack believed in finding happiness wherever possible.
sentences.cn: 杰克认为应该及时行乐。
朱丽叶的双眼闪耀着幸福的光芒。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: She paused and turned, her face alight with happiness.
sentences.cn: 她停住转过身，脸上洋溢着幸福。

sentences.en: Sometimes happiness is just a matter of attitude adjustment.--Susan Gale
sentences.cn: 有时候，幸福只需转变一下自己的态度。

sentences.en: Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 成功是得到你想要的，幸福是想要的东西正好得到。

sentences.en: The secret to happiness is to keep setting yourself new challenges.
sentences.cn: 幸福的秘诀就是要不停地给自己设定新的挑战。

sentences.en: We want our children to have the best possible chance of happiness.
sentences.cn: 我们希望自己的孩子得到追求幸福的最佳机会。

words.tran_cn: 快乐地；幸福地；幸运地；恰当地

phrases.tran_cn: 知足常乐；幸福在于满足
